title: A Time to Kill
summary: In Canton, Mississippi, a fearless young lawyer and his assistant defend a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his ten-year-old daughter, inciting violent retribution and revenge from the Ku Klux Klan.

title: The Italian Job
summary: After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.

title: Grandma's Boy
summary: A thirty-five-year-old video game tester has to move in with his grandma and her two old lady roommates.

title: Blood Diamond
summary: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

title: Back to the Future Part II
summary: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

title: The Retirement Plan
summary: When Ashley and her young daughter Sarah get caught up in a criminal enterprise that puts their lives at risk, she turns to estranged father Matt, currently living the life of a retired beach bum in the Cayman Islands.

title: Little Giants
summary: Misfits form their own opposing team to an elite peewee football team, coached by the elite team coach's brother.

title: National Treasure
summary: A historian races to find the legendary Templar Treasure before a team of mercenaries.

title: Law Abiding Citizen
summary: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free.

title: Decision to Leave
summary: A detective investigating a man's death in the mountains meets the dead man's mysterious wife in the course of his dogged sleuthing.

title: 30 Days of Night
summary: After an Alaskan town is plunged into darkness for a month, it is attacked by a bloodthirsty gang of vampires.

title: The School for Good and Evil
summary: Best friends Sophie and Agatha find themselves on opposing sides of an epic battle when they're swept away into an enchanted school where aspiring heroes and villains are trained to protect the balance between Good and Evil.

title: A Million Miles Away
summary: A biopic about Jose Hernandez and his path from a farm worker to becoming an engineer and an astronaut. A tale of perseverance, community and sacrifice to accomplish a seemingly impossible dream.

title: Caddyshack
summary: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a flatulent new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

title: A Serious Man
summary: Larry Gopnik, a Midwestern physics teacher, watches his life unravel over multiple sudden incidents. Though seeking meaning and answers amidst his turmoils, he seems to keep sinking.

title: The Strangers: Chapter 1
summary: A young couple drive cross-country toward a new beginning; unfortunately they have no choice but to stop in a secluded Airbnb in Oregon--and endure a night of terror against three masked strangers.

title: Titane
summary: Following a series of unexplained crimes, a father is reunited with the son who has been missing for 10 years.

title: Friends with Benefits
summary: A young man and woman decide to take their friendship to the next level without becoming a couple, but soon discover that adding sex only leads to complications.

title: The Fault in Our Stars
summary: Hazel and Gus are teenagers who meet at a cancer support group and fall in love. They both share the same acerbic wit and a love of books, especially "An Imperial Affliction", so they embark on a journey to visit an author in Amsterdam.

title: Below Her Mouth
summary: An unexpected affair quickly escalates into a heart-stopping reality for two women whose passionate connection changes their lives forever.

title: Golda
summary: Focuses on the intensely dramatic and high-stakes responsibilities and decisions that Golda Meir, also known as the 'Iron Lady of Israel,' faced during the Yom Kippur War.

title: Borat
summary: Kazakh TV talking head Borat is dispatched to the United States to report on the greatest country in the world. With a documentary crew in tow, Borat becomes more interested in locating and marrying Pamela Anderson.

title: The Greatest Beer Run Ever
summary: A man's story of leaving New York in 1967 to bring beer to his childhood buddies in the Army while they are fighting in Vietnam.

title: Tomb Raider
summary: Lara Croft, the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father, Lord Richard Croft disappeared.

title: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
summary: Robbed of his birthright, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy - whether he likes it or not.

title: White House Down
summary: While on a tour of the White House with his young daughter, a Capitol policeman springs into action to save his child and protect the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders.

title: RED 2
summary: Retired CIA agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.

title: The Old Oak
summary: The future for the last remaining pub, The Old Oak, in a village of Northeast England, where people are leaving the land as the mines are closed. Houses are cheap and available, thus making it an ideal location for Syrian refugees.

title: The Accused
summary: After a young woman suffers a brutal gang rape in a bar one night, a prosecutor assists in bringing the perpetrators to justice, including the ones who encouraged and cheered on the attack.

title: Species
summary: A group of scientists try to track down and trap a killer alien seductress before she successfully mates with a human.

title: Hitman's Wife's Bodyguard
summary: The bodyguard, Michael Bryce, continues his friendship with assassin, Darius Kincaid, as they try to save Darius' wife Sonia.

title: Run
summary: Chloe, a teenager who is confined to a wheelchair, is homeschooled by her mother, Diane. Chloe soon becomes suspicious of her mother and begins to suspect that she may be harboring a dark secret.

title: Horrible Bosses
summary: Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness.

title: GoldenEye
summary: Years after a friend and fellow 00 agent is killed on a joint mission, a secret space based weapons program known as "GoldenEye" is stolen. James Bond is assigned to stop a Russian crime syndicate from using the weapon.

title: Wanted
summary: A frustrated office worker discovers that he is the son of a professional assassin, and that he shares his father's superhuman killing abilities.

title: Vacation
summary: The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.

title: Demolition Man
summary: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

title: Gods of the Deep
summary: When a daring mission leads a deep sea submarine team into a mysterious opening on the ocean floor, they uncover a lost underwater world and awaken its ancient race of otherworldly beings.

title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
summary: Jake Pentecost, son of Stacker Pentecost, reunites with Mako Mori to lead a new generation of Jaeger pilots, including rival Lambert and 15-year-old hacker Amara, against a new Kaiju threat.

title: It Could Happen to You
summary: A police officer promises to share his lottery ticket with a waitress in lieu of a tip.

title: The Hurt Locker
summary: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.

title: The Holiday
summary: Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other's countries, where they each meet a local guy and fall in love.

title: Glory
summary: Robert Gould Shaw leads the U.S. Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices from both his own Union Army, and the Confederates.

title: Mrs
summary: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.

title: Rush Hour
summary: A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.

title: A Good Person
summary: Follows Allison, whose life falls apart following her involvement in a fatal accident.

title: Wonder Woman 1984
summary: Diana must contend with a work colleague, and with a businessman whose desire for extreme wealth sends the world down a path of destruction, after an ancient artifact that grants wishes goes missing.

title: Cloverfield
summary: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.

title: Army of the Dead
summary: Following a zombie outbreak in Las Vegas, a group of mercenaries take the ultimate gamble, venturing into the quarantine zone to pull off the greatest heist ever attempted.

title: Jumper
summary: A young man with teleportation abilities suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.

title: The Punisher
summary: An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante and sets out to unleash his wrath upon the corrupt businessman who slaughtered his entire family at a reunion.

title: An American Werewolf in London
summary: Two American college students on a walking tour of Britain are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists.

title: Batman Returns
summary: While Batman deals with a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaking havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman, a female employee of the latter becomes the Catwoman with her own vendetta.

title: Hellboy
summary: Caught between the worlds of the supernatural and human, Hellboy battles an ancient sorceress bent on revenge.

title: Operation Mincemeat
summary: During WWII, two intelligence officers use a corpse and false papers to outwit German troops.

title: Ad Astra
summary: Astronaut Roy McBride undertakes a mission across an unforgiving solar system to uncover the truth about his missing father and his doomed expedition that now, 30 years later, threatens the universe.

title: Avengers: The Kang Dynasty
summary: Plot under wraps.

title: Planet Terror
summary: After an experimental bio-weapon is released, turning thousands into zombie-like creatures, it's up to a rag-tag group of survivors to stop the infected and those behind its release.

title: Zombieland: Double Tap
summary: Columbus, Tallahassee, Wichita, and Little Rock move to the American heartland as they face off against evolved zombies, fellow survivors, and the growing pains of the snarky makeshift family.

title: Antrum: The Deadliest Film Ever Made
summary: A young boy and girl enter the forest to dig a hole to Hell. Said to be a cursed film from the late 1970s, "Antrum" examines the horrifying power of storytelling.

title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
summary: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

title: Lilo & Stitch
summary: Live-action remake of Disney's animated classic 'Lilo and Stitch'.

title: Hustlers
summary: Inspired by the viral New York Magazine article, Hustlers follows a crew of savvy former strip club employees who band together to turn the tables on their Wall Street clients.

title: Ninja Assassin
summary: A young ninja turns his back on the orphanage that raised him, leading to a confrontation with a fellow ninja from the clan.

title: Burning Betrayal
summary: Babi discovers a betrayal by her long-term partner and decides to embark on a new adventure in life. On this journey, she meets judge Marco and they begin to live a story permeated by a lot of sexual tension.

title: Identity
summary: Stranded at a desolate Nevada motel during a nasty rain storm, ten strangers become acquainted with each other when they realize that they're being killed off one by one.

title: Purple Hearts
summary: In spite of their many differences, Cassie, a struggling singer-songwriter, and Luke, a troubled Marine, agree to marry solely for military benefits, but when tragedy strikes, the line between real and pretend begins to blur.

title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
summary: During the Napoleonic Wars, a brash British captain pushes his ship and crew to their limits in pursuit of a formidable French war vessel around South America.

title: Rio
summary: When Blu, a domesticated macaw from small-town Minnesota, meets the fiercely independent Jewel, he takes off on an adventure to Rio de Janeiro with the bird of his dreams.

title: Brave
summary: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.

title: A Night in the Life of Jimmy Reardon
summary: A charming womanizer must find a way to get $80 to elope to Hawaii with his one true love, or else go to his father's chosen business school.

title: The New Mutants
summary: Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.

title: Sky High
summary: Set in an era where superheroes are commonly known and accepted, young William Stronghold, the son of the Commander and Jetstream, tries to find a balance between being a normal teenager and an extraordinary being.

title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
summary: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

title: The Book of Eli
summary: A drifter fights his way across a ravaged, post-apocalyptic America while protecting a sacred book that holds the secrets to humanity's salvation.

title: Cherry
summary: Cherry drifts from college dropout to army medic in Iraq - anchored only by his true love, Emily. But after returning from the war with PTSD, his life spirals into drugs and crime as he struggles to find his place in the world.

title: Dicks: The Musical
summary: A pair of business rivals discover that they're identical twins and decide to swap places in an attempt to trick their divorced parents to get back together.

title: The Little Rascals
summary: Alfalfa is wooing Darla and his "He-Man-Woman-Hating" friends attempt to sabotage the relationship.

title: The Beach
summary: On vacation in Thailand, Richard sets out for an island rumored to be a solitary beach paradise.

title: Premalu
summary: Sachin pursues romance but finds himself caught between two potential partners, leading to amusing complications.

title: Suitable Flesh
summary: A psychiatrist becomes obsessed with one of her young patients, who she later discovers is linked to an ancient curse.

title: Moonrise Kingdom
summary: Two 12-year-olds, who live on an island, fall in love with each other and elope into the wilderness. While people set out on a search mission, a violent storm approaching them catches their attention.

title: Killing Them Softly
summary: Jackie Cogan is an enforcer hired to restore order after three dumb guys rob a Mob protected card game, causing the local criminal economy to collapse.

title: The Emperor's New Groove
summary: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.

title: Red Dawn
summary: It is the dawn of World War III. In the west mountains of America, a group of teenagers band together to defend their town, and their country, from invading Soviet forces.

title: Predator 2
summary: The Predator returns to Earth, this time to stake a claim on the war-torn streets of a dystopian Los Angeles.

title: Tucker and Dale vs Evil
summary: Affable hillbillies Tucker and Dale are on vacation at their dilapidated mountain cabin when they are mistaken for murderers by a group of preppy college students.

title: Never Say Never Again
summary: A S.P.E.C.T.R.E. agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.

title: Bad Boys
summary: Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.

title: The Movie Critic
summary: The story of an irreverent critic in 1970s California who reviews mainstream movies for a porno magazine called The Popstar Pages.

title: BASEketball
summary: Two childhood friends are pro athletes of a national sport called BASEketball, a hybrid of baseball and basketball, and must deal with a greedy businessman scheming against their team.

title: Mr
summary: A girl falls for the "perfect" guy, who happens to have a very fatal flaw: he's a hitman on the run from the crime cartels who employ him.

title: Vanilla Sky
summary: A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover.

title: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
summary: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent.

title: The Lego Batman Movie
summary: A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.

title: Can't Buy Me Love
summary: An outcast secretly pays the most popular girl in school one thousand dollars to pretend to be his girlfriend for a month.

title: Road to Perdition
summary: A mob enforcer's son in 1930s Illinois witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

title: Dangal
summary: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

title: Welcome to the Punch
summary: When a notorious criminal is forced to return to London, it gives a detective one last chance to take down the man he's always been after.

title: Immortals
summary: Theseus is a mortal man chosen by Zeus to lead the fight against the ruthless King Hyperion, who is on a rampage across Greece to obtain a weapon that can destroy humanity.

title: Megamind
summary: Evil genius Megamind finally defeats his do-gooder nemesis, Metro Man, but is left without a purpose in a superhero-free world.
A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.

title: Game Night
summary: A group of friends who meet regularly for game nights find themselves entangled in a real-life mystery when the shady brother of one of them is seemingly kidnapped by dangerous gangsters.

title: The Wailing
summary: Soon after a stranger arrives in a little village, a mysterious sickness starts spreading. A policeman, drawn into the incident, is forced to solve the mystery in order to save his daughter.

title: Trainwreck
summary: Having thought that monogamy was never possible, a commitment-phobic career woman may have to face her fears when she meets a good guy.

title: End of Watch
summary: Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.

title: The Crazies
summary: After a strange and insecure plane crash, an unusual toxic virus enters a quaint farming town. A young couple are quarantined, but they fight for survival along with help from a couple of people.

title: I Saw the Devil
summary: A secret agent exacts revenge on a serial killer through a series of captures and releases.

title: The Ritual
summary: A group of old college friends reunite for a trip to a most dangerous country in Europe - Sweden, encountering a menacing presence there stalking them.

title: It Boy
summary: Alice works for "Rebelle" magazine, where she needs to let her hair down to get a promotion. When Balthazar returns a lost USB to Alice, the appearance of dating someone half her age helps her. Does it get real?

title: The Fighter
summary: Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.

title: Young & Beautiful
summary: After losing her virginity, Isabelle takes up a secret life as a call girl, meeting her clients for hotel-room trysts. Throughout, she remains curiously aloof, showing little interest in the encounters themselves or the money she makes.

title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
summary: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

title: The Matrix Reloaded
summary: Freedom fighters Neo, Trinity and Morpheus continue to lead the revolt against the Machine Army, unleashing their arsenal of extraordinary skills and weaponry against the systematic forces of repression and exploitation.

title: Desire
summary: In a social context deteriorated by a countrywide economic crisis, the life of several people will be turned upside down after they meet Cecile, a character who symbolizes desire.

title: You Are So Not Invited to My Bat Mitzvah
summary: Stacy and Lydia are BFFs who've always dreamed about having epic Bat Mitzvahs. However, things start to go comically awry when a popular boy and middle school drama threatens their friendship and their rite of passage.

title: Daredevil
summary: A man blinded by toxic waste which also enhanced his remaining senses fights crime as an acrobatic martial arts superhero.

title: The Waterboy
summary: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

title: What Women Want
summary: A cocky, chauvinistic advertising executive magically acquires the ability to hear what women are thinking.

title: My All-American
summary: Freddie Steinmark, an underdog on the gridiron, faces the toughest challenge of his life after leading his team to a championship season.

title: Do the Right Thing
summary: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.

title: Run Hide Fight
summary: 17-year-old Zoe Hull uses her wits, survival skills, and compassion to fight for her life, and those of her fellow classmates, against a group of live-streaming school shooters.

title: The Evil Dead
summary: Five friends travel to a cabin in the woods, where they unknowingly release flesh-possessing demons.

title: Love Machine
summary: Director Pavel Ruminov wanted to break up with his girlfriend. But she had a different opinion on the matter and refused to leave the flat, insisting their story was not over yet.

title: Ticket to Paradise
summary: A divorced couple teams up and travels to Bali to stop their daughter from making the same mistake they think they made 25 years ago.

title: WarGames
summary: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.

title: Nomadland
summary: A woman in her sixties, after losing everything in the Great Recession, embarks on a journey through the American West, living as a van-dwelling modern-day nomad.

title: Oldboy
summary: Obsessed with vengeance, a man sets out to find out why he was kidnapped and locked into solitary confinement for twenty years without reason.

title: Four Daughters
summary: Between light and darkness stands Olfa, a Tunisian woman and the mother of four daughters. One day, her two older daughters disappear. Filmmaker Kaouther Ben Hania invites professional actresses to fill in their absence.

title: Cinema Paradiso
summary: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

title: Chef
summary: A head chef quits his restaurant job and buys a food truck in an effort to reclaim his creative promise, while piecing back together his estranged family.

title: The Judge
summary: Big-city lawyer Hank Palmer returns to his childhood home where his father, the town's judge, is suspected of murder. Hank sets out to discover the truth; along the way he reconnects with his estranged family.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
summary: Follows a young Viking as he aspires to hunt dragons, and how he becomes unexpectedly a friend of a young dragon.

title: Dick Tracy
summary: The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprice's united mob.

title: The Holy Mountain
summary: In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a messianic character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.

title: Raya and the Last Dragon
summary: In a realm known as Kumandra, a re-imagined Earth inhabited by an ancient civilization, a warrior named Raya is determined to find the last dragon.

title: Cure
summary: A frustrated detective deals with the case of several gruesome murders committed by people who have no recollection of what they've done.

title: Tom & Jerry
summary: A chaotic battle ensues between Jerry Mouse, who has taken refuge in the Royal Gate Hotel, and Tom Cat, who is hired to drive him away before the day of a big wedding arrives.

title: Jungle Cruise
summary: Based on Disneyland's theme park ride where a small riverboat takes a group of travelers through a jungle filled with dangerous animals and reptiles but with a supernatural element.

title: Norbit
summary: A mild-mannered guy, who is married to a monstrous woman, meets the woman of his dreams, and schemes to find a way to be with her.

title: Mandy
summary: The enchanted lives of a couple in a secluded forest are brutally shattered by a nightmarish hippie cult and their demon-biker henchmen, propelling a man into a spiraling, surreal rampage of vengeance.

title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
summary: A young man in a small Midwestern town struggles to care for his mentally-disabled younger brother and morbidly obese mother while attempting to pursue his own happiness.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
summary: Atticus Finch, a widowed lawyer in Depression-era Alabama, defends a Black man against an undeserved rape charge, and tries to educate his young children against prejudice.

title: Hostiles
summary: In 1892, a legendary Army Captain reluctantly agrees to escort a Cheyenne chief and his family through dangerous territory.

title: Twins
summary: A physically perfect but innocent man goes in search of his long-lost twin brother, who is short, a womanizer, and small-time crook.

title: Furious 7
summary: Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.

title: Perfect Blue
summary: A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.

title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 3
summary: After the death of the family's patriarch, Toula attempts to locate her father's childhood friends in Greece for a family reunion.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
summary: A journalist is aided by a young female hacker in his search for the killer of a woman who has been dead for forty years.

title: Die Hard 2
summary: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

title: Mr
summary: A boy stands on a station platform as a train is about to leave. Should he go with his mother or stay with his father? Infinite possibilities arise from this decision. As long as he doesn't choose, anything is possible.

title: The Cell
summary: An F.B.I. Agent persuades a social worker, who is adept with a new experimental technology, to enter the mind of a comatose serial killer in order to learn where he has hidden his latest kidnap victim.

title: The Bad Guys
summary: To avoid prison, a gang of notorious animal criminals pretends to seek being rehabilitated, only for their leader to realize that he genuinely wants to change his ways.

title: The Blind Side
summary: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All-American football player and first-round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.

title: Risky Business
summary: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.

title: Movie 43
summary: A series of interconnected short films follows a washed-up producer as he pitches insane story lines featuring some of the biggest stars in Hollywood.

title: The Little Mermaid
summary: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

title: The Boy Next Door
summary: A woman, separated from her unfaithful husband, falls for a younger man who has moved in next door, but their torrid affair soon takes a dangerous turn.

title: Race for Glory: Audi vs
summary: A true David vs. Goliath story spotlighting the intense rivalry between Audi and Lancia at the 1983 Rally World Championship. Against all odds, Lancia battles to regain its former glory with a combination of innovation and courage.

title: Treasure Planet
summary: Jim Hawkins is a teenager who finds the map of a great treasure hidden by a space pirate. Together with some friends, he sets off in a large spaceship, shaped like a caravel, on his quest.

title: Hellraiser
summary: A woman discovers the newly resurrected, partially formed, body of her brother-in-law and lover. She starts killing for him to revitalize his body and escape the demonic beings that are pursuing him after he escaped their underworld.

title: The Machinist
summary: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

title: North by Northwest
summary: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.

title: Memory
summary: An assassin-for-hire finds that he's become a target after he refuses to complete a job for a dangerous criminal organization.

title: Sleepy Hollow
summary: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of three people; the culprit is legendary apparition The Headless Horseman.

title: The Quick and the Dead
summary: A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.

title: Zoolander
summary: At the end of his career, a clueless fashion model is brainwashed to kill the Prime Minister of Malaysia.

title: The Name of the Rose
summary: An intellectually nonconformist friar investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.

title: Red One
summary: After a villain kidnaps Santa from the North Pole, an E.L.F (Extremely Large and Formidable) operative must partner with the world's most accomplished tracker to find Santa and save Christmas.

title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
summary: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

title: Monsters University
summary: A look at the relationship between Mike Wazowski and James P. "Sully" Sullivan during their days at Monsters University, when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.

title: The Old Guard
summary: A covert team of immortal mercenaries is suddenly exposed and must now fight to keep their identity a secret just as an unexpected new member is discovered.

title: The Graduate
summary: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

title: Source Code
summary: A soldier wakes up in someone else's body and discovers he's part of an experimental government program to find the bomber of a commuter train within 8 minutes.

title: The Craft
summary: A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft, and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who anger them.

title: They Cloned Tyrone
summary: A series of eerie events thrusts an unlikely trio onto the trail of a nefarious government conspiracy in this pulpy mystery caper.

title: Sleepless in Seattle
summary: A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

title: Red Dragon
summary: A retired FBI agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down "The Tooth Fairy", a mysterious serial killer. Aiding him is imprisoned forensic psychiatrist Dr. Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter.

title: Toy Story 2
summary: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.

title: The Next Three Days
summary: A married couple's life is turned upside down when the wife is accused of a murder.

title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
summary: Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.

title: Capernaum
summary: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

title: Gattaca
summary: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

title: Naked
summary: An unemployed Mancunian vents his rage on unsuspecting strangers as he embarks on a nocturnal London odyssey.

title: Out of the Furnace
summary: When Rodney Baze mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother Russell takes matters into his own hands to find justice.

title: Police Academy
summary: A group of good-hearted, but incompetent misfits enter the police academy, but the instructors there are not going to put up with their pranks.

title: The Wicker Man
summary: A puritan police sergeant arrives in a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl, who the pagan locals claim never existed.

title: Deep Fear
summary: Storm-stricken drug traffickers force a yachtswoman to recover their sunken cocaine stash from shark-infested waters.

title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
summary: A young woman is held in an underground bunker by a man who insists that a hostile event has left the surface of the Earth uninhabitable.

title: What Every Frenchwoman Wants
summary: A teenager returns home to spend his summer vacation. However, in a mansion full of women, he will have no choice but to expand his education in titillating ways.

title: Orphan
summary: A husband and wife who recently lost their baby adopt a 9-year-old girl who is not nearly as innocent as she appears.

title: Halloween

title: The Return of the Living Dead
summary: When two bumbling employees at a medical supply warehouse accidentally release a deadly gas into the air, the vapors cause the dead to rise again as zombies.

title: The Hills Have Eyes
summary: A traveling family falls victim to a group of mutated cannibals in a desert far away from civilization.

title: The King's Speech

title: Den of Thieves

title: Good Boys
summary: Three 6th-grade boys ditch school and embark on an epic journey while carrying accidentally stolen drugs, being hunted by teenage girls, and trying to make their way home in time for a long-awaited party.

title: The Last Witch Hunter
summary: The last witch hunter is all that stands between humanity and the combined forces of the most horrifying witches in history.

title: The Aviator
summary: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s.

title: Winter's Bone
summary: An unflinching Ozark Mountain girl hacks through dangerous social terrain as she hunts down her drug-dealing father while trying to keep her family intact.

title: Varsity Blues
summary: A back-up quarterback is chosen to lead a Texas football team to victory after the star quarterback is injured.

title: The Jungle Book

title: The Outrun

title: Barbarella

title: The Interview

title: Death Wish
summary: Dr. Paul Kersey is an experienced trauma surgeon, a man who has spent his life saving lives. After an attack on his family, Paul embarks on his own mission for justice.

title: Sunset Blvd
summary: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

title: Me, Myself & Irene
summary: A nice-guy cop with Dissociative Identity Disorder must protect a woman on the run from a corrupt ex-boyfriend and his associates.

title: Sausage Party
summary: A sausage strives to discover the truth about his existence.

title: Nymphomaniac: Vol

title: MaXXXine
summary: Follows Maxine, who was the only survivor of the bloody incidents of X, as she continues her journey towards fame to be an actress in 1980s Los Angeles.

title: Silverado
summary: A misfit bunch of friends comes together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

title: The Sandpiper
summary: A free-spirited single mother forms a connection with the married headmaster of an Episcopalian boarding school in Monterey, California.

title: Capote

title: The Lawnmower Man

summary: Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.

title: Lost Highway
summary: Anonymous videotapes presage a musician's murder conviction, and a gangster's girlfriend leads a mechanic astray.

title: Sex Lives of the Potato Men
summary: Follows the sexual antics of a group of potato delivery men in Birmingham.

title: Unbroken

title: Stalker

title: Locked In

title: Poltergeist

title: The Room

title: The Eternal Memory

title: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen

title: Final Destination

title: Murder by Death

title: Midnight Cowboy

title: Elysium

title: The Legend of Billie Jean

title: Shakespeare in Love
summary: The world's greatest ever playwright, William Shakespeare, is young, out of ideas and short of cash, but meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

title: Mothers' Instinct

title: Strangers on a Train

title: Beethoven
summary: A slobbering St. Bernard becomes the center of attention for a loving family, but must contend with a dog-napping veterinarian and his henchmen.

title: Men in Black II
summary: Agent J is sent to find Agent K and restore his memory after the re-appearance of a case from K's past.

title: Machete
summary: After being set-up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.

title: As Good as It Gets
summary: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

title: Flight
summary: Troubling questions arise after airline pilot Whip Whitaker makes a miracle landing after a mid-air catastrophe.

title: PAW Patrol: The Mighty Movie
summary: A magical meteor crash lands in Adventure City and gives the PAW Patrol pups superpowers, transforming them into The Mighty Pups

title: Guillermo del Toro's Pinocchio
summary: A father's wish magically brings a wooden boy to life in Italy, giving him a chance to care for the child.

title: Redemption
summary: A damaged ex-special forces soldier navigating London's criminal underworld seizes an opportunity to assume another man's identity.

title: Get Smart
summary: Maxwell Smart, a highly intellectual but bumbling spy working for the CONTROL agency, is tasked with preventing a terrorist attack from rival spy agency KAOS.

title: Silent Night
summary: Nell, Simon, and their 3 sons are ready to welcome friends and family for what promises to be a perfect Christmas gathering. Perfect except for one thing: everyone is going to die.

title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
summary: When Hiccup discovers Toothless isn't the only Night Fury, he must seek the Hidden World, a secret Dragon Utopia before a hired tyrant named Grimmel finds it first.

title: Fatal Attraction
summary: A married man's one-night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

title: The Contractor
summary: A discharged U.S. Special Forces sergeant, James Harper, risks everything for his family when he joins a private contracting organization.

title: Occupied City

title: Lamb
summary: A childless couple discovers a mysterious newborn on their farm in Iceland.

title: No Reservations
summary: The life of a top chef changes when she becomes the guardian of her young niece.

title: The Blair Witch Project

title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
summary: A father and son, both coroners, are pulled into a complex mystery while attempting to identify the cause of death of a young woman who was apparently harboring dark secrets.

title: Green Room
summary: A punk rock band is forced to fight for survival after witnessing a murder at a neo-Nazi skinhead bar.

title: Alien: Resurrection
summary: Two centuries after her death, a powerful human/alien hybrid clone of Ellen Ripley aids a crew of space pirates in stopping the aliens from reaching Earth.

title: Die Another Day
summary: James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul, who is funding the development of an international space weapon.

title: Ghostbusters
summary: Following a ghost invasion of Manhattan, paranormal enthusiasts Erin Gilbert and Abby Yates, nuclear engineer Jillian Holtzmann, and subway worker Patty Tolan band together to stop the otherworldly threat.

title: Squealer
summary: When a local cop and an overzealous social-worker follow clues on missing persons cases around town, stomach-turning discoveries are unearthed on a pig farm, where the town butcher has been slaughtering more than livestock.

title: Death Becomes Her
summary: When a fading actress learns of an immortality treatment, she sees it as a way to outdo her long-time rival.

title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
summary: The untold story of one twelve-year-old's dream to become the world's greatest supervillain.

title: Fear
summary: When Nicole met David; handsome, charming, affectionate, he was everything. It seemed perfect, but soon she sees that David has a darker side. And his adoration turns to obsession, their dream into a nightmare, and her love into fear.

title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
summary: Video game adventurer Lara Croft comes to life in a movie where she races against time and villains to recover powerful ancient artifacts.

title: Alone
summary: A recently widowed traveler is kidnapped by a cold blooded killer, only to escape into the wilderness where she is forced to battle against the elements as her pursuer closes in on her.

title: Wrong Turn
summary: Friends hiking the Appalachian Trail are confronted by 'The Foundation', a community of people who have lived in the mountains for hundreds of years.

title: M*A*S*H
summary: The staff of a Korean War field hospital use humor and high jinks to keep their sanity in the face of the horror of war.

title: Fast X: Part 2
summary: Plot kept under wraps.

title: Drugstore June
summary: After the pharmacy in her small town is robbed, a girl who still lives at home with her parents takes matters into her own hands to solve the crime, while at the same time trying to get over her ex-boyfriend and become more of an adult.

title: Die Hard with a Vengeance
summary: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

title: Cabin Fever
summary: Five college graduates rent a cabin in the woods and begin to fall victim to a horrifying flesh-eating virus, which attracts the unwanted attention of the homicidal locals.

title: They Live
summary: They influence our decisions without us knowing it. They numb our senses without us feeling it. They control our lives without us realizing it. They live.

title: Dracula Untold
summary: As his kingdom is being threatened by the Turks, young prince Vlad Tepes must become a monster feared by his own people in order to obtain the power needed to protect his own family, and the families of his kingdom.

title: Melancholia
summary: Two sisters find their already strained relationship challenged as a mysterious new planet threatens to collide with Earth.

title: Deep Rising
summary: A group of heavily armed hijackers board a luxury ocean liner in the South Pacific Ocean to loot it, only to do battle with a series of large-sized, tentacled, man-eating sea creatures who had already invaded the ship.

title: Breaking Away
summary: A working-class Indiana teen obsessed with the Italian cycling team vies for the affections of a college girl while searching for life goals with his friends.

title: How to Date Billy Walsh
summary: Follows a pair of childhood friends: Amelia and Archie. Archie has always kept his love for her a secret, but just as he builds up the courage to declare his feelings, Amelia falls for Billy Walsh, the new transfer student.

title: We Need to Talk About Kevin

title: The Red Shoes
summary: A young ballet dancer is torn between the man she loves and her pursuit to become a prima ballerina.

title: Set It Up
summary: Two corporate executive assistants hatch a plan to match-make their two bosses.

title: The Void
summary: Shortly after delivering a patient to an understaffed hospital, a police officer experiences strange and violent occurrences seemingly linked to a group of mysterious hooded figures.

title: The Mighty Ducks
summary: A self-centered Minnesota lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

title: The Dictator

title: Seven Psychopaths

title: Jupiter Ascending

title: Enter the Void

title: 300: Rise of an Empire
summary: Greek general Themistocles of Athens leads the naval charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

title: Moonstruck
summary: Loretta Castorini, a bookkeeper from Brooklyn, New York, finds herself in a difficult situation when she falls for the brother of the man she has agreed to marry.

title: Save the Green Planet!
summary: Byeong-gu believes that the world is on the verge of an alien invasion, and sets out to save the world.

title: Goldfinger
summary: While investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

title: Pet Sematary: Bloodlines
summary: In 1969 a young Jud Crandall and his childhood friends band together to confront an ancient evil that has gripped their hometown of Ludlow.

title: Palmer
summary: An ex-convict strikes up a friendship with a boy from a troubled home.

title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
summary: A crime boss teams up with a cop to track down a serial killer.

title: Super 8
summary: During the summer of 1979, a group of friends witness a train crash and investigate subsequent unexplained events in their small town.

title: Straight Outta Compton

title: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
summary: Some of Sin City's most hard-boiled citizens cross paths with a few of its more reviled inhabitants.

title: Luther: The Fallen Sun
summary: Brilliant but disgraced detective John Luther breaks out of prison to hunt down a sadistic serial killer who is terrorising London.

title: The Pod Generation

title: Master Gardener

title: Dark Shadows
summary: An imprisoned vampire, Barnabas Collins, is set free and returns to his ancestral home, where his dysfunctional descendants are in need of his protection.

title: Grindhouse

title: Coherence
summary: Strange things begin to happen when a group of friends gather for a dinner party on an evening when a comet is passing overhead.

title: Coming to America

title: Duplex

title: As Above, So Below
summary: When a team of explorers venture into the catacombs that lie beneath the streets of Paris, they uncover the dark secret that lies within this city of the dead.

title: Silence
summary: In the 17th century, two Portuguese Jesuit priests travel to Japan in an attempt to locate their mentor, who is rumored to have committed apostasy, and to propagate Catholicism.

title: The Master
summary: A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by the Cause and its charismatic leader.

title: Somewhere Quiet
summary: Follows a woman as she readjusts to normalcy after a kidnapping. Her sense of reality begins to deteriorate when she travels to her husband's family compound.

title: La haine
summary: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

title: American Graffiti
summary: A group of teenagers in California's central valley spend one final night after their 1962 high school graduation cruising the strip with their buddies before they pursue their varying goals.

title: The Theory of Everything

title: Crimes of the Future
summary: Humans adapt to a synthetic environment, with new transformations and mutations. With his partner Caprice, Saul Tenser, celebrity performance artist, publicly showcases the metamorphosis of his organs in avant-garde performances.

title: Heartbreakers
summary: A mother and daughter con team seduce and scam wealthy men.
In a totalitarian future society, a man, whose daily work is re-writing history, tries to rebel by falling in love.

title: The Road Warrior
summary: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community escape a horde of bandits.

title: Love Story
summary: A boy and a girl from different backgrounds fall in love regardless of their upbringing - and then tragedy strikes.

title: Picture of Beauty
summary: In an early 20th century village, a painter with an unusual commission finds two pretty girls to model for him. The girls slowly come of age while exploring their sexuality and finding liberation in a repressed society.

title: Career Opportunities
summary: Jim is the dorky son of a local cement contractor who lives at home and has no direction. Josie is the gorgeous daughter of a wealthy businessman who dreams of leaving town. They find they have a lot in common.

title: Three Thousand Years of Longing
summary: A lonely scholar, on a trip to Istanbul, discovers a Djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom.

title: I Care a Lot
summary: A crooked legal guardian who drains the savings of her elderly wards meets her match when a woman she tries to swindle turns out to be more than she first appears.

title: Footloose
summary: City teenager Ren MacCormack moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
summary: Five friends head out to rural Texas to visit the grave of a grandfather. On the way they stumble across what appears to be a deserted house, only to discover something sinister within. Something armed with a chainsaw.

title: Don't Breathe
summary: Hoping to walk away with a massive fortune, a trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who isn't as helpless as he seems.

title: Gremlins
summary: A young man inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

title: Brawl in Cell Block 99
summary: A former boxer-turned-drug runner lands in a prison battleground after a deal gets deadly.

title: Lie with Me
summary: An outgoing, sexually aggressive young woman meets and begins a torrid affair with an equally aggressive young man in which their affair begins to bring a strain on their personal lives.

title: Blades of Glory
summary: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.

title: The Wanderers
summary: The Wanderers is a teenage, Italian gang in Bronx, NYC, 1963. They have their confrontations with other gangs. Drugs and weapons are uncool. Adult life awaits them.

title: The Mask of Zorro
summary: A young thief seeking revenge for his brother's death is trained by the once-great, aging Zorro, who is pursuing his own vengeance.

title: The Nun
summary: A priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate the death of a young nun in Romania and confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

title: Passages
summary: A gay couple's marriage is thrown into crisis when one of them impulsively begins a passionate affair with a young woman.

title: The Choice
summary: Travis and Gabby first meet as neighbors in a small coastal town and wind up in a relationship that is tested by life's most defining events.

title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
summary: A world-class playboy and part-time secret agent from the 1960s emerges after thirty years in a cryogenic state to battle with his nemesis Dr. Evil.

title: Angel Has Fallen
summary: Mike Banning is framed for the attempted assassination of the President and must evade his own agency and the FBI as he tries to uncover the real threat.

title: Sex Tape
summary: A married couple wake up to discover that the sex tape they made the evening before has gone missing, leading to a frantic search for its whereabouts.

title: Wolfs
summary: Follows two lone wolf fixers who are assigned to the same job.

title: Liar Liar
summary: A pathological liar-lawyer finds his career turned upside down when he inexplicably cannot physically lie for 24 whole hours.

title: Wildflower
summary: A girl navigates life with two intellectually-disabled parents and an extended family that can't quite agree on the best way to help.

title: Mulan
summary: To keep her ailing father from serving in the Imperial Army, a fearless young woman disguises herself as a man and battles northern invaders in China.

title: Infinite
summary: A man discovers that his hallucinations are actually visions from past lives.

title: Hackers
summary: Teenage hackers discover a criminal conspiracy with plans to use a computer virus that will capsize five oil tankers.

title: Dolittle
summary: A physician who can talk to animals embarks on an adventure to find a legendary island with a young apprentice and a crew of strange pets.

title: The Mechanic
summary: An elite hitman teaches his trade to an apprentice who has a connection to one of his previous victims.

title: Hitch
summary: A smooth-talking man falls for a hardened columnist while helping a shy accountant woo a beautiful heiress.

title: The Wrong Missy
summary: Tim thinks he's invited the woman of his dreams on a work retreat to Hawaii, realizing too late he mistakenly texted someone from a nightmare blind date.

title: The Secret Garden
summary: A young, recently-orphaned girl is sent to England after living in India all of her life. Once there, she begins to explore her new, seemingly-isolated surroundings, and its secrets.

title: Miller's Crossing
summary: Tom Reagan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

title: The Boogeyman
summary: Still reeling from the tragic death of their mother, a teenage girl and her younger sister find themselves plagued by a sadistic presence in their house and struggle to get their grieving father to pay attention before it's too late.

title: Lethal Weapon
summary: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.

title: The Strangers
summary: A young couple staying in an isolated vacation home are terrorized by three unknown assailants.

title: Salem's Lot
summary: A writer travels to a town where the people become vampires.

title: My Girl
summary: Vada is obsessed with death. Her mother is dead, and her father runs a funeral parlor. When Vada's father hires Shelly, a makeup expert, and begins to fall in love, Vada is outraged and does everything in her power to split them up.

title: The Island
summary: A man living in a futuristic sterile colony begins to question his circumscribed existence when his friend is chosen to go to the Island, the last uncontaminated place on earth.

title: Terminator Genisys
summary: When John Connor, leader of the human resistance, sends Sgt. Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect Sarah Connor and safeguard the future, an unexpected turn of events creates a fractured timeline.

title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
summary: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.

title: Desperado
summary: Former musician and gunslinger El Mariachi arrives at a small Mexican border town after being away for a long time. His past quickly catches up with him and he soon gets entangled with the local drug kingpin Bucho and his gang.

title: The Secret in Their Eyes
summary: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

title: Under the Tuscan Sun
summary: Frances Mayes, a 35-year-old San Francisco writer, gets a divorce that leaves her with terminal writer's block and depression. Later, she decides to buy a house in Tuscany in order to change her life.

title: Green Lantern
summary: Reckless test pilot Hal Jordan is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps.

title: The Magnificent Seven
summary: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

title: Rebecca
summary: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

title: Earth Mama
summary: An intimate coming of age story of a pregnant single mother who embraces her Bay Area community as she determines the fate of her family.

title: Frivolous Lola
summary: Set in the 1950s Italian countryside, the film tells the story of Lola and Masetto, a young couple whose views on premarital sex differ drastically.

title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
summary: As a string of mysterious killings grips Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Movie: Mugen Train
summary: After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.

title: Five Feet Apart
summary: A pair of teenagers with cystic fibrosis meet in a hospital and fall in love, though their disease means they must avoid close physical contact.

title: Charlie's Angels
summary: Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.

title: After Hours
summary: An ordinary word processor has the worst night of his life after he agrees to visit a girl in Soho he met that evening at a coffee shop.

title: Climax

title: Lords of Dogtown

title: Couples Retreat

title: 3 Ninjas

title: Redeeming Love
summary: Sold into prostitution as a child, Angel knows nothing but betrayal. Can her heart ever be mended? Based upon the novel by Francine Rivers.

title: Dr
summary: A resourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.

title: Swamp Thing
summary: After a violent incident with a special chemical, a research scientist is turned into a swamp plant monster.

title: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
summary: The Brothers Grimm arrive at the home of a wealthy Grande Dame who speaks of the many legends surrounding the fable of the cinder girl before telling the "true" story of her ancestor.

title: Cabaret

title: The Empty Man
summary: On the trail of a missing girl, an ex-cop comes across a secretive group attempting to summon a terrifying supernatural entity.

title: Theater Camp

title: The Cannonball Run

title: Click

title: The Dry

summary: Larry spans the globe, uniting favorite and new characters while embarking on an epic quest to save the magic before it's gone forever.

title: Southpaw
summary: After a fatal incident sends him on a rampant path of destruction, a champion boxer fights to get custody of his daughter and revive his professional career.

title: The Woman King

title: Space Jam: A New Legacy

title: Vivarium

title: The Piano

title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
summary: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.

title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan

title: The A-Team

title: Fractured

title: Never Let Me Go

title: Pale Rider

title: Bullitt

A man who specialises in debunking paranormal occurrences checks into the fabled room 1408 in the Dolphin Hotel. Soon after settling in, he confronts genuine terror.

title: Quantum of Solace
summary: James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organisation from eliminating a country's most valuable resource.

title: The Hole
summary: Four teenagers at a British private school secretly uncover and explore the depths of a sealed underground hole created decades ago as a possible bomb shelter.

title: The Terminal

title: 99 Moons
summary: Bigna and Frank are two people of different thoughts. When their different worlds collide they become obsessively entwined in a passionate affair.

title: Young Hearts
summary: Elias develops feelings for his new neighbor Alexander. He soon realizes he's falling in love for the first time.

title: Commando
summary: A retired Special Forces colonel tries to save his daughter, who was abducted by his former subordinate.

title: RoboCop

title: My Best Friend's Wedding
summary: When a woman's long-time friend reveals he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.

title: The Stranger

title: Cheaper by the Dozen
summary: With his wife on a book tour, Tom Baker finds his life turned upside down when he agrees to care for his twelve children while simultaneously also coaching his new football team.

summary: The mummified body of Imhotep is shipped to a museum in London, where he once again wakes and begins his campaign of rage and terror.

title: Hall Pass

title: Enchanted
summary: A young maiden in a land called Andalasia, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York City by an evil Queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.

title: Pandorum

title: Cowboys & Aliens

title: Beowulf
summary: The warrior Beowulf must fight and defeat the monster Grendel, who is terrorizing Denmark, then Grendel's Mother, who begins killing out of revenge.

title: Magic Mike

title: Mechanic: Resurrection

title: It Comes at Night

title: Riders of Justice

title: Eraserhead

title: Scrapper

title: Glengarry Glen Ross
summary: An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office.

title: Sharper
summary: Motivations are suspect, and expectations are turned chaos, as a con artist takes on Manhattan billionaires.

title: Warcraft
summary: As an Orc horde invades the planet Azeroth using a magic portal, a few human heroes and dissenting Orcs must attempt to stop the true evil behind this war.

summary: Six Los Angeles celebrities are stuck in James Franco's house after a series of devastating events just destroyed the city. Inside, the group not only have to face the apocalypse, but themselves.

title: No Strings Attached
summary: A guy and girl try to keep their relationship strictly physical, but it's not long before they learn that they want something more.

title: Coyote vs
summary: A story set in the ACME warehouse, the manufacturer of anything and everything used by the Looney Tunes characters.

title: Now You See Me 2
summary: The Four Horsemen resurface, and are forcibly recruited by a tech genius to pull off their most impossible heist yet.

title: Ghost in the Shell

title: 2 Fast 2 Furious

title: Flash Gordon
summary: A football player and his friends travel to the planet Mongo and find themselves fighting the tyranny of Ming the Merciless to save Earth.

title: Walk the Line
summary: A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis, where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis, and Carl Perkins.

title: Lolita
summary: A middle-aged college professor becomes infatuated with a 14-year-old girl.

title: Uncle Buck
summary: Laid back commitment-phobe Buck babysits his brother's rebellious teenage daughter and her cute younger brother and sister.

title: Mischief
summary: Guided by James Dean, the eternal symbol of youthful rebellion, a gawky high school student obsessed with the hottest girl in class takes a crash course in teenage coolness from his motorcycle-rebel neighbor.

title: Some Like It Hot
summary: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

title: A History of Violence
summary: A mild-mannered man becomes a local hero through an act of violence, which sets off repercussions that will shake his family to its very core.

title: Love & Mercy

title: Rocky IV

title: Men of Honor
summary: The story of Carl Brashear, the first African-American U.S. Navy Diver, and the man who trained him.

title: Hellboy

title: Terminator Salvation
summary: In 2018, a mysterious new weapon in the war against the machines, half-human and half-machine, comes to John Connor on the eve of a resistance attack on Skynet. But whose side is he on, and can he be trusted?

title: Pokémon: Detective Pikachu
summary: In a world where people collect Pokémon to do battle, a boy comes across an intelligent talking Pikachu who seeks to be a detective.

title: A Room with a View

title: Atomic Blonde

title: Snow White and the Huntsman

title: Striptease
summary: A stripper and single mother gets dragged into a dangerous situation after a congressman takes a fancy to her.

title: Willow
summary: A young farmer is chosen to undertake a perilous journey in order to protect a special baby from an evil queen.

title: Akira

title: Army of Thieves

title: The Mauritanian

title: Life of Pi
summary: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
summary: Greg Heffley is a 12 year old who is fresh out of elementary and transitions to middle school, where he has to learn the consequences and responsibility to survive the year.

title: Funny Games
summary: Two psychopathic young men take a family hostage in their cabin.

title: The Invisible Guest
summary: A successful entrepreneur accused of murder and a witness preparation expert have less than three hours to come up with an impregnable defense.

title: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
summary: When Jacob (Asa Butterfield) discovers clues to a mystery that stretches across time, he finds Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children. But the danger deepens after he gets to know the residents and learns about their special powers.

title: The Last American Virgin
summary: Pizza delivery boy Gary, loudmouth David and hunky Rick are three high school students out to lose their virginity any way they can. Gary falls for transfer student Karen, who gets involved with Rick.

title: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer

title: Disobedience
summary: A woman returns to her Orthodox Jewish community that shunned her for her attraction to a female childhood friend. Once back, their passions reignite as they explore the boundaries of faith and sexuality.

title: Adore
summary: A pair of childhood friends and neighbors fall for each other's sons.

title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre
summary: After picking up a traumatized young hitchhiker, five friends find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chainsaw-wielding loon and his family of equally psychopathic killers.

title: Layer Cake
summary: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

title: Frailty
summary: A mysterious man arrives at the offices of an FBI agent and recounts his childhood: how his religious fanatic father received visions telling him to destroy people who were in fact "demons."

title: Gone in 60 Seconds
summary: A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal fifty cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.

title: Friday the 13th
summary: A group of young adults visit a boarded up campsite named Crystal Lake where they soon encounter the mysterious Jason Voorhees and his deadly intentions.

title: Ben-Hur
summary: After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend in 1st-century Jerusalem, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

title: Green Street Hooligans
summary: A wrongfully expelled Harvard undergrad moves to London, where he is introduced to the violent underworld of football hooliganism.

title: Only Lovers Left Alive
summary: A depressed musician reunites with his lover. However, their romance, which has already endured several centuries, is disrupted by the arrival of her uncontrollable younger sister.

title: Fighting with My Family
summary: A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment.

title: Star Trek Into Darkness
summary: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction.

title: Women Talking
summary: Do nothing, stay and fight, or leave. In 2010, the women of an isolated religious community grapple with reconciling a brutal reality with their faith.

title: Lawless
summary: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a trio of bootlegging brothers are threatened by a new special deputy and other authorities angling for a cut of their profits.

title: Friendly Persuasion
summary: The pacifist attitude of a Quaker family is tested as a result of the American Civil War.

title: Shark Tale
summary: When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage.

title: Wild at Heart
summary: Young lovers Sailor and Lula run from the variety of weirdos that Lula's mom has hired to kill Sailor.

title: The Change-Up
summary: Dave is a married man with three kids and a loving wife, and Mitch is a single man who is at the prime of his sexual life. One fateful night while Mitch and Dave are peeing in a fountain, lightning strikes and they switch bodies.

title: Harakiri
summary: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

title: Mary Queen of Scots
summary: Mary Stuart's (Saoirse Ronan's) attempt to overthrow her cousin Elizabeth I (Margot Robbie), Queen of England, finds her condemned to years of imprisonment before facing execution.

title: A Fish Called Wanda
summary: In London, four very different people team up on a jewel heist, then try to double-cross one another for the loot, complicated by their efforts to fool a very proper barrister.

title: Rye Lane
summary: Two youngsters reeling from bad breakups connect over an eventful day in South London.

title: There's Something Wrong with the Children
summary: A family takes a weekend trip with longtime friends and their two young children, but, they suspect something supernatural when the kids behave strangely after disappearing into the woods overnight.

title: Mona Lisa Smile
summary: A free-thinking art professor teaches conservative 1950s Wellesley girls to question their traditional social roles.

title: The Conjuring: Last Rites
summary: Plot under wraps.

title: Drive My Car
summary: A renowned stage actor and director learns to cope with a big personal loss when he receives an offer to direct a production of Uncle Vanya in Hiroshima.

title: Tag
summary: A small group of former classmates organize an elaborate, annual game of tag that requires some to travel all over the country.

title: Inferno
summary: When Robert Langdon wakes up in an Italian hospital with amnesia, he teams up with Dr. Sienna Brooks and they race across Europe together against the clock to foil a deadly global plot.

title: Triangle
summary: Five friends set sail and their yacht is overturned by a strange and sudden storm. A mysterious ship arrives to rescue them, and what happens next cannot be explained.

title: Devotion
summary: A pair of U.S. Navy fighter pilots risk their lives during the Korean War and become some of the Navy's most celebrated wingmen.

title: The Time Machine
summary: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

title: The French Connection
summary: A pair of NYPD detectives in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a heroin smuggling ring based in Marseilles, but stopping them and capturing their leaders proves an elusive goal.

title: Rocketman
summary: A musical fantasy about the fantastical human story of Elton John's breakthrough years.

title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
summary: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

title: A Cure for Wellness
summary: An ambitious young executive is sent to retrieve his company's CEO from an idyllic but mysterious "wellness center" at a remote location in the Swiss Alps, but soon suspects that the spa's treatments are not what they seem.

title: Logan's Run
summary: A police officer in the future uncovers the deadly secret behind a society that worships youth.

title: One More Shot
summary: Following the attack on the black site in Poland, Navy SEAL Jake Harris is ordered to escort terrorist suspect Amin Mansur to Washington D.C for interrogation.

title: The Hot Chick
summary: An attractive and popular teenager, who is mean-spirited toward others, finds herself in the body of an older man, and must find a way to get back to her original body.

title: Hairspray
summary: Pleasantly plump teenager Tracy Turnblad teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

title: Red Lights
summary: Psychologist Margaret Matheson and her assistant study paranormal activity, which leads them to investigate a world-renowned psychic who has resurfaced years after his toughest critic mysteriously passed away.

title: Swordfish

title: Meet the Parents
summary: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

title: The Tourist
summary: Revolves around Frank, an American tourist visiting Italy to mend a broken heart. Elise is an extraordinary woman who deliberately crosses his path.

title: See How They Run
summary: In the West End of 1950s London, plans for a movie version of a smash-hit play come to an abrupt halt after a pivotal member of the crew is murdered.

title: Cold Mountain
summary: In the waning days of the American Civil War, a wounded soldier embarks on a perilous journey back home to Cold Mountain, North Carolina to reunite with his sweetheart.

title: Suzume
