title: Eden
summary: Follows a group of people fueled by a profound desire for change; in order to turn their back to society they leave everything behind and set their futures on the harsh landscape of the Galapagos.

title: Blow-Up
summary: A fashion photographer unknowingly captures a death on film after following two lovers in a park.

title: The Brady Bunch Movie
summary: The original 1970s TV family is now placed in the 1990s, where they're even more square and out of place than ever.

title: Frida
summary: A biography of artist Frida Kahlo, who channeled the pain of a crippling injury and her tempestuous marriage into her work.

title: No Exit
summary: During a blizzard and stranded at an isolated highway rest stop in the mountains, a college student discovers a kidnapped child hidden in a car belonging to one of the people inside.

title: Youth
summary: A retired orchestra conductor is on vacation with his daughter and his film director best friend in the Alps when he receives an invitation from Queen Elizabeth II to perform for Prince Philip's birthday.

title: Pain & Gain
summary: A trio of bodybuilders in Florida get caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.

title: Final Destination 2
summary: Death is stalking Kimberly Corman and multiple survivors of a deadly highway accident.

title: El Dorado
summary: Cole Thornton, a gunfighter for hire, joins forces with old friend, Sheriff J.P. Hara. Together with an old Indian fighter and a gambler, they help a rancher and his family fight a rival rancher who's trying to steal their water.

title: I, Frankenstein
summary: Frankenstein's creature finds himself caught in an all-out, centuries-old war between two immortal clans.

title: The Big Sick
summary: Pakistan-born comedian Kumail Nanjiani and grad student Emily Gardner fall in love but struggle as their cultures clash. When Emily contracts a mysterious illness, Kumail finds himself forced to face her feisty parents, his family's expectations, and his true feelings.

title: Now You See Me 3
summary: A third installment of the 'Now You See Me' franchise. Plot undisclosed.

title: The Secret World of Arrietty
summary: The Clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. Life changes for the Clocks when their teenage daughter Arrietty is discovered.

title: Poker Face

title: Reign of Fire
summary: A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth and begins setting everything ablaze, establishing dominance over the planet.

title: Valentine
summary: Five women are stalked by an unknown assailant while preparing for Valentine's Day.

title: Defiance

title: High Tension
summary: Best friends Marie and Alexia decide to spend a quiet weekend at Alexia's parents' secluded farmhouse. But on the night of their arrival, the girls' idyllic getaway turns into an endless night of horror.

title: God Is a Bullet
summary: Taking matters into his own hands, Detective Bob Hightower tries to infiltrate an evil cult to save his kidnapped daughter and avenge the murder of his wife.

title: Somewhere in Time
summary: A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time and meet the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.

title: Colombiana
summary: A young girl in Bogotá witnesses her parents' murder and grows up to be a stone-cold assassin.

title: The Last Temptation of Christ

title: Every Which Way But Loose
summary: The San Fernando Valley adventures of trucker turned prize-fighter Philo Beddoe and his pet orangutan Clyde.

title: The Golden Compass
summary: In a parallel universe, young Lyra Belacqua journeys to the far North to save her best friend and other kidnapped children from terrible experiments by a mysterious organization.

title: The Report
summary: Idealistic Senate staffer Daniel J. Jones, tasked by his boss to lead an investigation into the CIA's post 9/11 Detention and Interrogation Program, uncovers shocking secrets.

title: Sex and Lucía
summary: Various lives converge on an isolated island, all connected by an author whose novel has become inextricably entwined with his own life.

title: Snake Eyes
summary: A G.I. Joe spin-off centered around the character of Snake Eyes.

title: Sea of Love
summary: A detective investigating a series of murders becomes involved with a woman who may be the culprit.

title: The Invitation
summary: When a man accepts an invitation to a dinner party hosted by his ex-wife, the unsettling past reopens old wounds and creates new tensions.

title: Bang Gang: A Modern Love Story
summary: In the well-to-do suburbs of a small town, a group of pretty average, well-adjusted sixteen and seventeen year olds are ordinary adolescents who take a singular path.

title: Perfect Sense

title: Seven Years in Tibet
summary: Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian climber, breaks out of prison and travels to the holy city of Lhasa. He is employed as an instructor to the 14th Dalai Lama and soon becomes his close confidante.

title: Never Back Down
summary: A frustrated and conflicted teenager arrives at a new high school to discover an underground fight club, and meets a classmate who begins to coerce him into fighting.

title: The Babysitters

summary: New York police officer Ralph Sarchie investigates a series of crimes. He joins forces with an unconventional priest, schooled in the rites of exorcism, to combat the possessions that are terrorizing their city.

summary: Sean Anderson partners with his mom's husband on a mission to find his grandfather, who is thought to be missing on a mythical island.

title: Loving Adults
summary: The thin line between love and hate turns deadly when a wife discovers her husband's affair - and they both take extreme measures to get what they want.

title: Starship Troopers: Traitor of Mars
summary: Federation trooper, Johnny Rico's ordered to work with a group of new recruits on a satellite station on Mars, where giant bugs have decided to target their next attack.

title: Mank

title: Epic Movie

title: Tommy Boy
summary: After his auto-parts tycoon father dies, the overweight, underachieving son teams up with a snide accountant to try and save the family business.

title: A Real Pain
summary: Mismatched cousins David and Benji reunite for a tour through Poland to honor their beloved grandmother. The adventure takes a turn when the odd-couple's old tensions resurface against the backdrop of their family history.

title: Sleeping with Other People
summary: A good-natured womanizer and a serial cheater form a platonic relationship that helps reform them in ways, while a mutual attraction sets in.

title: Say Anything
summary: A noble underachiever and a beautiful valedictorian fall in love the summer before she goes off to college.

title: Cry Macho
summary: A one-time rodeo star and washed-up horse breeder takes a job to bring a man's young son home and away from his alcoholic mom. On their journey, the horseman finds redemption through teaching the boy what it means to be a good man.

title: His House
summary: A refugee couple makes a harrowing escape from war-torn South Sudan, but then they struggle to adjust to their new life in an English town that has an evil lurking beneath the surface.

title: The Triplets of Belleville
summary: When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved pooch Bruno team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.

title: The Farm
summary: A young couple gets kidnapped and treated like farm animals after stopping at a roadside diner to eat meat.

title: Monster Hunter
summary: When Cpt. Artemis and her loyal soldiers are transported to a new world, they engage in a desperate battle for survival against enormous enemies with incredible powers. Feature film based on the video game by Capcom.

title: Manodrome
summary: Conflicted about his girlfriend's pregnancy, Ralphie's life spirals out of control when he meets a mysterious family of men.

title: Bully

title: Blackboard Jungle
summary: A new English teacher at a violent, unruly inner-city school is determined to do his job, despite resistance from both students and faculty.

title: The Sea Beast
summary: When a young girl stows away on the ship of a legendary sea monster hunter, they launch an epic journey into uncharted waters - and make history to boot.

title: Creation of the Gods I: Kingdom of Storms
summary: A magnificent eastern high fantasy epic that recreates the prolonged mythical wars between humans, immortals and monsters, which happened more than three thousand years ago.

title: The Dead Zone
summary: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability to foresee future events.

title: Near Dark
summary: A small-town farmer's son reluctantly joins a traveling group of vampires after he is bitten by a beautiful drifter.

title: eXistenZ
summary: A game designer on the run from assassins must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged.

title: The Umbrellas of Cherbourg

title: Hangman
summary: A homicide detective brings his partner out of retirement to help catch a serial killer whose crimes are based on the children's game Hangman.

title: In the Cut
summary: New York City writing professor, Frannie Avery, has an affair with a police detective who is investigating the murder of a beautiful young woman in her neighborhood.

title: Bros
summary: Two men with commitment problems attempt a relationship.

title: Point Break
summary: A young FBI agent infiltrates an extraordinary team of extreme sports athletes he suspects of masterminding a string of unprecedented, sophisticated corporate heists.

title: Death on the Nile
summary: As Hercule Poirot enjoys a luxurious cruise down the Nile, a newlywed heiress is found murdered on board. Can Poirot identify the killer before the ship reaches the end of its journey?

title: Jack the Giant Slayer

summary: Monica and Quincy love and play basketball together through many life challenges from childhood to adulthood.

title: The Wind that Shakes the Barley
summary: Against the backdrop of the Irish War of Independence, two brothers fight a guerrilla war against British forces.

title: Entrapment
summary: An insurance agent is sent by her employer to track down and help capture an art thief.

title: Orphan: First Kill
summary: After orchestrating a brilliant escape from an Estonian psychiatric facility, Esther travels to America by impersonating the missing daughter of a wealthy family.

title: Cop Land
summary: The Sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community, populated by New York City police officers, slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.

title: Firebrand
summary: Follows Queen Katherine Parr & Henry VIII's marriage.

title: Six Days Seven Nights
summary: Robin Monroe, a New York magazine editor, and the gruff pilot Quinn Harris must put aside their mutual dislike if they are to survive after crash landing on a deserted South Seas island.

title: One Love

title: The Night House
summary: A widow begins to uncover her recently deceased husband's disturbing secrets.

title: My Left Foot

title: The Art of Racing in the Rain

title: The Gift
summary: A fortune teller with extrasensory perception is asked to help find a young woman who has mysteriously disappeared.

title: It's Complicated
summary: When attending their son's college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. But the complicated fact is they're divorced and he's remarried.

title: Candyman
summary: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.

title: T2 Trainspotting

title: Red Tails

title: The Snowman
summary: Detective Harry Hole investigates the disappearance of a woman whose scarf is found wrapped around an ominous-looking snowman.

title: The Lair of the White Worm
summary: When an archaeologist uncovers a strange skull in a foreign land, the residents of a nearby town begin to disappear, leading to further inexplicable occurrences.

title: Labor Day
summary: Depressed single mom Adele and her son Henry offer a wounded, fearsome man a ride. As police search town for the escaped convict, the mother and son gradually learn his true story as their options become increasingly limited.

summary: A quiet observation of the triumphs and defeats of daily life, along with the poetry evident in its smallest details.

title: Sleeping Dogs
summary: An ex-homicide detective (Russell Crowe) with memory loss is forced to solve a brutal murder, only to uncover chilling secrets from his forgotten past.

title: Marathon Man

title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead

title: Bardo: False Chronicle of a Handful of Truths

title: Planes, Trains & Automobiles
summary: A Chicago advertising man must struggle to travel home from New York for Thanksgiving, with a lovable oaf of a shower-curtain-ring salesman as his only companion.

title: House of Sand and Fog
summary: An abandoned wife is evicted from her house and starts a tragic conflict with her house's new owners.

title: Dutch
summary: To get to know his girlfriend's son, a working-class good guy volunteers to pick him up from his prep school, only to learn that he isn't the nicest young man.

title: Dial M for Murder
summary: A former tennis star arranges the murder of his adulterous wife.

title: Calamity Jane
summary: The story of Calamity Jane, her saloon, and her romance with Wild Bill Hickok.

title: The Keeper
summary: The love story of a young English woman and a German PoW, who together overcome prejudice, public hostility and personal tragedy.

title: You're Next

title: Weekend
summary: After a drunken house party with his straight mates, Russell heads out to a gay club. Just before closing time he picks up Glen but what's expected to be just a one-night stand becomes something else, something special.

title: Cinderella
summary: When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq and from her Fairy Godmother.

title: Night Angel
summary: An evil spirit assumes the disguise of a beautiful young woman, so it can seduce and kill men.

title: Now and Then
summary: Four 12-year-old girls grow up together during an eventful small-town summer in 1970.

title: Solaris
summary: A troubled psychologist is sent to investigate the crew of an isolated research station orbiting a bizarre planet.

title: The Brothers Grimsby
summary: A new assignment forces a top spy to team up with his football hooligan brother.

title: The Way Back

title: Bobi Wine: The People's President

title: Death at a Funeral
summary: Chaos ensues when a man tries to expose a dark secret regarding a recently deceased patriarch of a dysfunctional British family.

title: The Spy Who Loved Me
summary: James Bond investigates the hijacking of British and Russian submarines carrying nuclear warheads, with the help of a K.G.B. agent whose lover he killed.

title: Maleficent: Mistress of Evil
summary: Maleficent and her goddaughter Aurora begin to question the complex family ties that bind them as they are pulled in different directions by impending nuptials, unexpected allies, and dark new forces at play.

title: Rock of Ages
summary: A small-town girl and a city boy meet on the Sunset Strip while pursuing their Hollywood dreams.

title: Castaway
summary: Middle-aged Gerald Kingsland advertises in a London paper for a female companion to spend a year with him on a desert island.

title: Bend It Like Beckham
summary: Two ambitious girls, despite their parents' wishes, have their hearts set on careers in professional football.

title: The Best of Me
summary: A pair of former high school sweethearts reunite after many years when they return to visit their small hometown.

title: The Portable Door
summary: Two lowly interns at J.W. Wells and Co., a mysterious firm based in London, uncover a plot by their CEO to disrupt the ancient magical world with modern corporate practices.

title: Forever My Girl
summary: After being gone for a decade a country star returns home to the love he left behind.

title: Clerks III
summary: Dante, Elias, and Jay and Silent Bob are enlisted by Randal after a heart attack to make a movie about the convenience store that started it all.

title: The Union

title: Samaritan
summary: A young boy learns that a superhero who was thought to have died after an epic battle twenty-five years ago may in fact still be alive.

title: Harlem Nights

title: Forever Young

title: Krull
summary: A prince and a fellowship of companions set out to rescue his bride from a fortress of alien invaders who have arrived on their home planet, Krull.

title: Morgan
summary: A corporate risk-management consultant must decide whether or not to terminate an artificially created humanoid being.

title: The Bounty
summary: Fed up with their Captain's harsh discipline, a sailing ship's crew decides to take action.

title: The Road to El Dorado
summary: Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.

title: Inland Empire
summary: As an actress begins to adopt the persona of her character in a film, her world becomes nightmarish and surreal.

title: A View to a Kill
summary: The recovery of a microchip from the body of a fellow British secret agent leads James Bond to a mad industrialist scheming to cause massive destruction.

title: Dead Silence
summary: After his wife meets a grisly end, Jamie Ashen returns to his hometown of Ravens Fair to find answers. His investigation leads him to the ghost of a ventriloquist named Mary Shaw who seems to have ties to his entire family tree

title: Tron: Ares
summary: Showcases Ares, Leto's computer program, on a journey from the digital world to the human one.

title: The Colony
summary: Set in the distant future, a female astronaut, shipwrecked on the long-decimated Earth, must decide the fate of the wasteland's remaining populace.

title: Stepmom

title: Speed Racer
summary: Young driver, Speed Racer, aspires to be champion of the racing world with the help of his family and his high-tech Mach 5 automobile.

title: Hush
summary: An aging, reclusive Southern belle plagued by a horrifying family secret descends into madness after the arrival of a lost relative.

title: Deathstalker
summary: A lone warrior nicknamed Deathstalker is sent by a witch on a quest to find a sword, a chalice, and an amulet, two of which are held by the wicked king and sorcerer, Munkar.

title: My Sole Desire
summary: Have you ever been to a strip club? But you've already wanted to - at least once - you didn't dare, that's all. This film tells the story of someone who dared

title: The Expendables 2

title: The Blackening
summary: Seven friends go away for the weekend and end up trapped in a cabin with a killer who has a vendetta. Will their street smarts and knowledge of horror movies help them stay alive? Probably not.

title: Time Bandits
summary: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

title: All Good Things
summary: David Marks, a real estate scion, is suspected of killing his wife Katie, who disappeared in 1982.

title: Ordinary People
summary: The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father and the guilt-ridden younger son.

title: The Miracle Club
summary: There's just one dream for the women of Ballygar to taste freedom: to win a pilgrimage to the sacred French town of Lourdes.

title: The Guard

title: Hot Shots!

title: 8MM
summary: A private investigator is hired to discover if a "snuff film" is authentic or not.

title: Aquamarine
summary: Two teenage girls discover a mermaid in their beach club's swimming pool.

title: Hunger
summary: A woman running her family's noodle restaurant receives an invitation to join the fine-dining industry under the tutelage of an infamous chef.

title: Happy Feet
summary: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

title: Incident in a Ghostland
summary: A mother of two who inherits a house is confronted with murderous intruders on the first night in their new home and fights for her daughters' lives. Sixteen years later when the daughters reunite at the house, things get really strange.

title: Flesh+Blood
summary: In medieval Europe, a young girl from a noble family is obsessed with her captors - commoners.

title: Crimson Tide
summary: On a U.S. nuclear missile sub, a young First Officer stages a mutiny to prevent his trigger happy Captain from launching his missiles before confirming his orders to do so.

title: Double Indemnity
summary: A Los Angeles insurance representative lets an alluring housewife seduce him into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, an insurance investigator.

title: Still Fabulous

title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
summary: The story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, and his friendship with his mentor, Professor G.H. Hardy.

title: The Gay Divorcee
summary: A woman thinks a flirting man is the co-respondent her lawyer has hired to expedite her divorce.

title: Nuremberg
summary: Based on the book 'The Nazi and the Psychiatrist' by Jack El-Hai

title: Leap Year
summary: Laura's personal life consists of one affair after another. She meets Arturo and the pair enter into an intense, violent sexual relationship. As days go by, Laura crosses out the days on a calendar, revealing her secret past to her lover.

title: Freaky Tales
summary: Four interconnected stories set in 1987 Oakland, CA. will tell about the love of music, movies, people, places and memories beyond our knowable universe.

title: I Came By
summary: Follows a young graffiti artist who discovers a shocking secret that would put him and the ones closest to him in danger.

title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
summary: A remake of the 1951 classic science fiction film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

title: Yes Man
summary: A man challenges himself to say "yes" to everything.

title: Concrete Utopia
summary: Survivors from a massive earthquake struggle for a new life in Seoul.

title: The Ghost Writer
summary: A ghost writer, hired to complete the memoirs of a former British Prime Minister, uncovers secrets that put his own life in jeopardy.

title: Made of Honor

title: Judge Dredd

title: Corpse Bride
summary: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

title: The Killing Fields
summary: A journalist is trapped in Cambodia during tyrant Pol Pot's bloody 'Year Zero' cleansing campaign, which claimed the lives of two million 'undesirable' civilians.

title: One Hundred and One Dalmatians
summary: When a litter of Dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella De Vil, the owners must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.

title: Autumn and the Black Jaguar
summary: The heart of the Amazon about incredible friendship and the protection and wonder of nature.

title: Scouts Guide to the Zombie Apocalypse
summary: Three scouts, on the eve of their last camp-out, discover the true meaning of friendship when they attempt to save their town from a zombie outbreak.

title: The Searchers

title: The Great Beauty
summary: Jep Gambardella has seduced his way through the lavish nightlife of Rome for decades, but after his 65th birthday and a shock from the past, Jep looks past the nightclubs and parties to find a timeless landscape of absurd, exquisite beauty.

title: Great Expectations

title: The Treacherous
summary: The story of Joseon's tyrant king Yeonsan who exploits the populace for his own carnal pleasures, his seemingly loyal retainer who controls him and all court dealings, and a woman who seeks vengeance.

title: The Big Chill
summary: A group of seven former college friends gather for a weekend reunion at a South Carolina vacation home after the funeral of another of their college friends.

title: Dangerous
summary: Rashmi, an aspiring model, rents an apartment and meets married neighbor Nalini. They fall in love and plot to steal from Nalini's gangster husband. Will the risky con work?

title: Freaks
summary: A circus' beautiful trapeze artist agrees to marry the leader of side-show performers, but his deformed friends discover she is only marrying him for his inheritance.

title: The Settlers
summary: In Chile in 1901, three horseman are paid to protect a vast estate. Accompanying a British soldier and an American mercenary is a mixed-race sniper, who realizes that his true mission is to kill the indigenous population.

title: The Cider House Rules
summary: A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

title: Back in Action
summary: Former CIA spies Emily and Matt are pulled back into espionage after their secret identities are exposed.

title: Single White Female
summary: A woman advertising for a new roommate finds that something very strange is going on with the tenant who decides to move in.

title: My Bloody Valentine
summary: A decades-old folk tale surrounding a deranged murderer killing those who celebrate Valentine's Day turns out to be true to legend when a group defies the killer's order and people start turning up dead.

title: The Electrical Life of Louis Wain
summary: English artist Louis Wain rises to prominence at the end of the 19th century for his surreal cat paintings that seemed to reflect his declining sanity.

title: Candy Land
summary: A seemingly naive and devout young woman navigates her way into the underground world of truck stop sex workers a.k.a. "lot lizards."

title: Just My Luck
summary: Manhattanite Ashley is known to many as the luckiest woman around. After a chance encounter with a down-and-out young man, however, she realizes that she's swapped her fortune for his.

title: Scanners

title: The Spectacular Now
summary: A hard-partying high school senior's philosophy on life changes when he meets the not-so-typical "nice girl."

title: Chasing Amy
summary: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's a lesbian.

title: Bloodshot
summary: Ray Garrison, a slain soldier, is re-animated with superpowers.

title: The Cloverfield Paradox
summary: Orbiting a planet on the brink of war, scientists test a device to solve an energy crisis, and end up face-to-face with a dark alternate reality.

title: Quigley Down Under

title: The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind

title: Ice Age: Collision Course

title: The Last Emperor

title: Heavy Metal
summary: A glowing green orb - which embodies ultimate evil - terrorizes a young girl with an anthology of bizarre and fantastic stories of dark fantasy, eroticism and horror.

title: Safe House
summary: A young CIA agent is tasked with looking after a fugitive in a safe house. But when the safe house is attacked, he finds himself on the run with his charge.

title: All the Money in the World
summary: The story of the kidnapping of 16-year-old John Paul Getty III and the desperate attempt by his devoted mother to convince his billionaire grandfather Jean Paul Getty to pay the ransom.

title: Beyond the Wall
summary: The life of a blind man starts to fall apart when a wandering woman enters his life.

title: Under Paris
summary: Sophia, a brilliant scientist comes to know that a large shark is swimming deep in the river.

title: Freedom Writers
summary: A young teacher inspires her class of at-risk students to learn tolerance, apply themselves and pursue education beyond high school.

title: Sahara
summary: Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.

title: The Protégé
summary: Rescued as a child by the legendary assassin Moody, Anna is the world's most skilled contract killer. However, when Moody is brutally killed, she vows revenge for the man who taught her everything she knows.

title: The Cable Guy
summary: A designer makes a grievious mistake when he rejects the friendship of a borderline cable guy.

title: To Kill a Tiger
summary: Ranjit, a farmer in India, takes on the fight of his life when he demands justice for his 13-year-old daughter, the victim of a brutal gang rape. His decision to support his daughter is virtually unheard of, and his journey unprecedented.

title: The Iron Lady
summary: An elderly Margaret Thatcher talks to the imagined presence of her recently deceased husband as she struggles to come to terms with his death while scenes from her past life, from girlhood to British prime minister, intervene.

title: Holy Spider
summary: A journalist descends into the dark underbelly of the Iranian holy city of Mashhad as she investigates the serial killings of sex workers by the so called "Spider Killer", who believes he is cleansing the streets of sinners.

title: Bachelor Party
summary: A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.

title: Gandhi
summary: The life of the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.

title: Save Yourselves!
summary: A young Brooklyn couple head to an upstate cabin to unplug from their phones and reconnect with each other. Blissfully unaware of their surroundings, they are left to their own devices as the planet falls under attack.

title: Jeepers Creepers: Reborn
summary: Forced to travel with her boyfriend, Laine begins to experience premonitions associated with the urban myth of The Creeper. She believes that something supernatural has been summoned - and that she is at the center of it all.

title: The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus
summary: Having made a deal with the Devil himself for immortality many millennia ago, the now decrepit mystic Doctor Parnassus fights for the freedom of his only daughter's soul.

title: The Love Bug
summary: Down-on-his-luck race car driver Jim Douglas teams up with a little VW Bug that has a mind of it's own, not realizing Herbie's worth until a sneaky rival plots to steal him.

title: The Wall
summary: Two American Soldiers are trapped by a lethal sniper, with only an unsteady wall between them.

title: Vesper
summary: Struggling to survive with her father after the collapse of Earth's ecosystem, 13-year-old Vesper must use her wits, strength and bio-hacking abilities to fight for the future.

title: Detachment
summary: A substitute teacher who drifts from classroom to classroom finds a connection to the students and teachers during his latest assignment.

title: Emma
summary: While matchmaking for friends and neighbours, a young 19th Century Englishwoman nearly misses her own chance at love.

title: They Came to a City
summary: Adapted from a J.B. Priestley play with many of the original actors. The tale of various people who have come to live in an "ideal" city and their hopes and reasons for doing so.

title: Wet Hot American Summer
summary: Set on the last day of camp, in the hot summer of 1981, a group of counselors try to complete their unfinished business before the day ends.

title: Universal Soldier
summary: Soldiers who were killed in action are brought back to life in a top secret military experiment that creates superhuman warriors.

title: Beverly Hills Cop II
summary: Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills to help Taggart and Rosewood investigate Chief Bogomil's near-fatal shooting and the series of "alphabet crimes" associated with it.

title: The Fantastic Four
summary: When dosed with cosmic rays, four intrepid explorers are given incredible powers.

title: Spy Game
summary: Retiring CIA agent Nathan Muir recalls his training of Tom Bishop while working against agency politics to free him from his Chinese captors.

title: Ooru Peru Bhairavakona
summary: A man goes in search of some urgently required answers to the world of Bhairavakona, from which there's seemingly no way out.

title: Dream a Little Dream
summary: An accident puts the consciousness of an elderly dream researcher into the body of a bratty teenager. The problem? The kid prefers dreamworld limbo to real life.

title: Kiss the Future
summary: Besieged Sarajevans find hope in underground art and music. U2 supports them amid crisis. Culminates in post-war unification concert.

title: Peeping Tom
summary: A young man murders women, using a movie camera to film their dying expressions of terror.

title: Shelby Oaks
summary: A woman's desperate search for her long-lost sister falls into obsession upon realizing that the imaginary demon from their childhood may have been real.

title: The Hustle
summary: Two con women - one low rent and the other high class - team up to take down the men who have wronged them.

title: Book Club: The Next Chapter
summary: Follows the new journey of four best friends as they take their book club to Italy for the fun girls trip they never had.

title: Brimstone
summary: From the moment the new Reverend climbs the pulpit, Liz knows that she and her family are in great danger.

title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
summary: In the Far East, Alex O'Connell, the son of famed mummy fighters Rick and Evy O'Connell, unearths the mummy of the first Emperor of Qin -- a shape-shifting entity cursed by a witch centuries ago.

title: Barton Fink
summary: A renowned New York playwright is enticed to California to write for the movies and discovers the hellish truth of Hollywood.

title: To Live and Die in L
summary: A fearless Secret Service agent will stop at nothing to bring down the counterfeiter who killed his partner.

title: Life
summary: In 1932, two strangers are wrongfully convicted and develop a strong friendship in prison that lasts them through the 20th century.

title: 9 to 5
summary: Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him.

title: The Gambler
summary: Literature professor and gambler Jim Bennett's debt causes him to borrow money from his mother and a loan shark. Further complicating his situation, is his relationship with one of his students. Will Bennett risk his life for a second chance?

title: Nightbreed
summary: A troubled young man is drawn to a mythical place called Midian where a variety of friendly monsters are hiding from humanity. Meanwhile, a sadistic serial killer is looking for a patsy.

title: Ip Man
summary: During the Japanese invasion of China, a wealthy martial artist is forced to leave his home when his city is occupied. With little means of providing for themselves, Ip Man and the remaining members of the city must find a way to survive.

title: Of Mice and Men
summary: A nomadic farm worker looks after his dimwitted, gentle-giant friend during the Great Depression.

title: In the Mouth of Madness
summary: An insurance investigator begins discovering that the impact a horror writer's books have on his fans is more than inspirational.

title: Seven Pounds
summary: A man with a fateful secret embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption by forever changing the lives of seven strangers.

title: And Justice for All
summary: A lawyer is forced to defend a guilty judge, while defending other innocent clients, and trying to find punishment for the guilty and provide justice for the innocent.

title: Crossfire
summary: A man is murdered, apparently by one of a group of demobilized soldiers he met in a bar. But which one? And why?

title: The Bone Collector
summary: A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.

title: The Wiz
summary: An adaptation of "The Wizard of Oz" that tries to capture the essence of the African-American experience.

title: The Good Dinosaur
summary: In a world where dinosaurs and humans live side-by-side, an Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely human friend.

title: Selma
summary: A chronicle of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.'s campaign to secure equal voting rights via an epic march from Selma to Montgomery, Alabama, in 1965.

title: Mudbound
summary: Two men return home from World War II to work on a farm in rural Mississippi, where they struggle to deal with racism and adjusting to life after war.

title: Three Days of the Condor
summary: A bookish CIA researcher in Manhattan finds all his co-workers dead, and must outwit those responsible until he figures out who he can really trust.

title: Patriots Day
summary: The story of the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing and the aftermath, which includes the city-wide manhunt to find the terrorists responsible.

title: Violent Night
summary: An elite team of mercenaries breaks into a family compound on Christmas Eve, taking everyone hostage. However, they aren't prepared for a surprise combatant: Santa Claus is on the grounds, and he's about to show why this Nick is no saint.

title: Time Trap
summary: A professor enters a cave and goes missing. Some of his students come looking for him and get trapped in the cave as well.

title: The Only Living Boy in New York
summary: Adrift in New York City, a recent college graduate's life is upended by his father's mistress.

title: Run All Night
summary: Mobster and hit man Jimmy Conlon has one night to figure out where his loyalties lie: with his estranged son, Mike, whose life is in danger, or his longtime best friend, mob boss Shawn Maguire, who wants Mike to pay for the death of his own son.

title: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
summary: Two drag performers and a transgender woman travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.

title: Chariots of Fire
summary: Two British track athletes, one a determined Jew and the other a devout Christian, are driven to win in the 1924 Olympics as they wrestle with issues of pride and conscience.

title: 48 Hrs
summary: A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him in order to track down a killer.
